androidsrus

Class Utilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidsrus.Utilities

  • public class Utilities
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains methods that are useful throughout the AndroidsRus program

      • pickARandomSerialNumber

        public int pickARandomSerialNumber(java.util.HashMap map)
        This method returns a random and unique serial number with 7 digits
        Parameters:
        map - holds a hash map containing serial numbers of existing robots as keys and Robot objects as values.
        Returns:
        a random and unique serial number

      • optionInputHandler

        public int optionInputHandler(int size)
        Handles user input so that the user has to input a valid option
        Parameters:
        size - holds the last valid option (from 1 to 'size')
        Returns:
        an integer with a valid option

      • robotDetailsPrinter

        public void robotDetailsPrinter(Robot robot)
        This method prints information on a particular robot from the old line of robots
        Parameters:
        robot - holds an object of class Robot

      • robotDetailsPrinter

        public void robotDetailsPrinter(Robot robot,
                                java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> origin,
                                java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,Robot> robots)
        This method prints information on a particular robot from the new line of robots
        Parameters:
        robot - holds instance of class Robot
        origin - holds hash map containing part name Strings as keys and serial number as values. It is used to obtain the origin of a part of parameter 'robot'
        robots - holds a hash with serial numbers as keys and Robot objects as values. It is used to obtain a robot from its serial number

        Gets the object r of class Random
        Returns:
        object r of class Random
